edge: The intense fight between the two families results in Jassi's father and Billu's uncle killing each other, leading to Jassi's vow to remain unmarried until he kills Randhawa's son.
Flees the village with Jassi, later settling in London due to the rivalry between Sandhus and Randhawas.
Billu ultimately vows to remain unmarried until he kills in light of his uncle's death during the intense fight between the two families.
Yearns for marriage with Billu to be completed due to her uncle's death during the intense fight between the two families.
Best friends, Jassi decides to go to India despite being made aware of the rivalry by Pathan.
Help Billu search for Randhawa's son with the help of their younger brother.
Unknown to Jassi, who flirts with her, Sukh is Billu's younger sister returning to Phagwara after completing her studies in Delhi.
Offers a ride to Jassi to the Gurudwara, as the land behind the Gurudwara is Jassi's.
Tony offers Jassi a ride to a Gurudwara and tries to kill him. Relation: antagonist-protagonist
Jassi meets Billu at a temple and Billu invites Jassi to his house. Relation: acquaintance-host
Sukh recognizes Jassi and prompts Billu to invite him to his house. Relation: friend-invited guest
Billu reveals to Tony that Jassi is the person they were searching for these 25 years. Relation: accomplice-accomplice
Jassi finds out that he is in the Sandhu household and feigns injury to stay. Relation: guest-hostile environment
The Sandhu household treats guests as 'akin to God' and forbids any killings in the house during the period. Relation: hospitality-forbidden act
Sukh's friend Tej 'Bobby' Jaswal, a doctor, finds out that Jassi has been lying all along but confides this secretly to Sukh alone. Relation: ally-confidante
The inspector promises to escort Jassi out but instead leads him to a dilapidated mansion. Relation: guardian-betrayal
In an attempt to escape, Jassi eventually lands back into the confrontation with Billu and his men. Relation: victim-persecutor
enemy relationship, Jassi and Billu have a rivalry
friendship relationship, Sukh and Bobby are friends
unknown relationship, Jassi and Sukh have some connection
parent-child relationship, Pammi is Billu's mother
participant relationship, Bobby participates in the engagement ceremony
participant relationship, Sukh participates in the engagement ceremony
escape relationship, Jassi tries to escape from the engagement ceremony
location relationship, Jassi is located in the Sandhu household
possession relationship, Jassi has land papers
